text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Submeter Support Scheme 

Regulations 2023.

title: the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2023 (No.
heading: 3. The 22nd day of November 2023 is prescribed as the applicable date.
text_raw: 3. The 22nd day of November 2023 is prescribed as the applicable date.

title: the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2023 (No.
heading: 4. Each of the following is prescribed to be an operative date:
text_raw:
4. Each of the following is prescribed to be an operative date: 

(a) 

in respect of the first payment period, 29 November 2023; 

(b) 

in respect of the second payment period, 20 December 2023; 

(c) 

in respect of the third payment period, 28 February 2024.
text_norm: 4 following prescribed operative date (a) respect first payment period 29 november 2023 (b) respect second payment period 20 december 2023 (c) respect third payment period 28 february 2024

title: the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2023 (No.
heading: 5. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the
text_raw:
5. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the 

purposes of section 8 (1)(b) of the Act of 2023: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in respect of the first payment period, the period commencing on 
29 November 2023 and ending on 31 December 2023; 

in respect of the second payment period, the period commencing 
on 20 December 2023 and ending on 31 January 2024; 

in respect of the third payment period, the period commencing 
on 28 February 2024 and ending on 31 March 2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th November, 2023.

title: the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2023 (No.
heading: 6. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the
text_raw:
6. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the 

purposes of section 9(2) of the Act of 2023: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in respect of the first payment period, the period commencing on 
1 December 2023 and ending on 31 December 2023; 

in respect of the second payment period, the period commencing 
on 1 January 2024 and ending on 29 February 2024; 

in respect of the third payment period, the period commencing 
on 1 March 2024 and ending on 30 April 2024. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 November, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 November, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
